scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && mkdir -p dist/ui && cp src/ui/styles.css dist/ui/styles.css && cp src/ui/modal.js dist/ui/modal.js && cp src/ui/setup-flow.js dist/ui/setup-flow.js && cp src/ui/auth-flow.js dist/ui/auth-flow.js
scripts.test: npm run build && rm -rf dist-tests && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && node --test dist-tests/src/tests/**/*.test.js
